<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/voip/numbers/available"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns all the available phone numbers matching the parameters specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"numberType":{"description":"Number type","type":"integer"},"isoCountryCode":{"description":"ISO country code","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
